这样输入,.

replies.author: hyh303
replies.txt_content:
img +图片链接+ /img
（img两边要加[]，如[img]）把上边两个我发的删了吧

replies.author: 123喔
replies.txt_content: 详情参看此贴的最佳答案

replies.author: undefined
replies.txt_content:
[img]图片链接[/img]

比如

[img]http://www.minecraftforum.net/public/style_images/mcf/9_logo.png[/img]复制代码
